allow:
Bash(./scripts/git-merge.sh "feat: Complete Terms of Service and Privacy Policy pages with comprehensive AI call center content

- Fixed double rendering animation issues by removing duplicate navbar/footer includes and preventing WOW.js double initialization
- Created comprehensive Terms of Service with 13 sections covering AI voice technology, UAE TDRA compliance, data protection, and legal framework
- Implemented complete Privacy Policy with 12 sections covering GDPR, UAE DPA, voice data processing, AI transparency, and user rights
- Added modular component architecture for both legal pages with reusable Blade components and JSON data structures
- Enhanced navigation with smooth scrolling quick-jump links and professional VoIP AI themed design
- Integrated Data Protection Officer contact information and privacy rights portal placeholder
- Ensured full compliance with UAE telecommunications regulations, international privacy laws, and AI industry standards
- Removed legal dropdown from main navigation per user request, keeping footer links intact")
